I HAVE NO SOUND!

Vista 64 bit, 4850s in crossfire, quadcore, I can run it and play it fine, but NO SOUND!

Can't find anything about what went wrong, anyone???

... noobs u dont need this torrent... what i did was right click on my desktop shortcut click open file location then double clicked on
oalinst then press ok... and there ya go u got the openAL32.dll file + u have sound now enjoy
